about_the_game:
The relentless waves crashed against the worn wooden hull of the ship, as if mocking the desperate cries of the crew. The storm had come without mercy, tearing the vessel apart like a fragile toy. In the chaos, only a handful of survivors managed to cling to the remnants of the ship, their hopes fading with each passing moment. As night came, your companions were slowly picked off by sharks before they could reach land. It seems fate was on your side - for now. You managed to evade the shark attacks and landed upon a forgotten shore.

You always possessed a sense of adventure, but never imagined it would lead to this moment—a shipwrecked soul on a dangerous isle, surrounded by treacherous waters and untamed wilderness. The isle is rich with the resources to keep you alive but, it seems there is another inhabitant. A Jotun of fearsome strength has lived here for ages and doesn't enjoy visitors.

Every night his assaults grow stronger. You must fight the elements, keep from starving, and find a way to survive and eventually defeat the ancient Jotun.

Features:
Over 20 building and placeable structures.
Night/Day and weather systems.
Hunting system.
7 harvestable resources.
